1.content:
'Oh Tommy, you don't have to keep doing this' said Sarah as she helped her boyfriend out of the trash can.

Tommy was sweat, but a pretty skinny kid. He had tried to stand up for his girlfriend against some jock, but it didn't go well.

'He never learns' commented his younger sister Elisa, Sarah's friend.

***

I'll show them, Tommy thought. He had ordered some weight-gain pills to buff him up, so he could impress Sarah.

As it takes four, he dosen't notice a warning label on the bottle...
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
He woke up the next morning, and to his dissapointment, no muscles have developed.

'I guess it takes time' he mused.
11.title: Guess it takes time

113.content:
Then, Elisa walks in.

'What, making sure you still skinny?' she quipped.

'Shut up'

She then saw the bottle.

'Pills? These never work'

'Listen, just leave!'
113.title: Sister shows up

choices: His rage make his muscles grow. He then challenges his sister to a fight.
He challenges his sister to a fight She beats him up.
1132.content: "Make me, wimpo! Take another magic pill and beat me up with your big muscles." Tommy got mad at his sister's taunt and began to growl in rage.
1132.title: She does not

choices: Sister notices, makes fun of him
12.content:
Tommy eagerly inspected himself in the mirror the next morning. To his dissapointment, he did not look buffer.

As he turned around, he noticed a little sway to his butt. He looked at it. Was it bigger...?
12.title: Bigger Butt

121.content:
Tommy next lifts up his shirt....to his surprise a small mound of flesh has gathered around his waist.

Just as he puts his shirt down his sister walks in and say"***************".
121.title: Little Tummy

1212.content: Does he tell the truth
1212.title: Have you gained weight?

The fight you know how you lost remember

info.brief_description: 90-pound weakling takes pills to get buffed up, but doesn't read a warning label carefully
info.description: Tommy takes pills to muscle up, but has some unforseen side-effects...
